SELECT IFNULL(NULLIF(CUSTOMER_ID, ''), '고객 아이디 없음') AS CUSTOMER_ID , IFNULL(NULLIF(ADVISOR_ID, ''), '상담원 아이디 없음') AS ADVISOR_ID , IFNULL(NULLIF(CUSTOMER_NM, ''), '고객 이름 없음') AS CUSTOMER_NM , IFNULL(NULLIF(CUSTOMER_PHONE, ''), '고객 전화번호 없음') AS CUSTOMER_PHONE , IFNULL(NULLIF(CUSTOMER_HIGHLIGHT, ''), '고객 관심여부 정보 없음') AS CUSTOMER_HIGHLIGHT , IFNULL(NULLIF(ADVISOR_NM, ''), '상담원 이름 없음') AS ADVISOR_NM , IFNULL(NULLIF(CALL_ID, ''), '통화 고유번호 없음') AS CALL_ID , MAX(TIME_FORMAT(TIME(DATE_ADD(CALL_START_TIME, INTERVAL CEIL(CALL_TIME/1000/60) MINUTE)), '%h:%i %p')) AS CALL_START_TIME FROM DP_ADV_CALL_DATA
CALL_START_TIME > DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00')
AND ADVISOR_ID = #{agentId}
GROUP BY CUSTOMER_ID , ADVISOR_ID , CUSTOMER_NM , CUSTOMER_PHONE , CUSTOMER_HIGHLIGHT , ADVISOR_NM , CALL_ID
HAVING CALL_START_TIME BETWEEN TIME_FORMAT(#{timeSt}, '%h:%i %p') AND TIME_FORMAT(#{timeEd}, '%h:%i %p')
ORDER BY
CUSTOMER_NM ASC
CALL_START_TIME DESC
LIMIT ${limit}

SELECT STT , STT_ONLY , WHO FROM DP_ADV_STT_RESULT
CMD = 'T'
AND REC_KEY = #{recKey}
ORDER BY STT_INDEX ASC
